subject: Radio
Deaths (Obituaries)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mr. Allbright broadcast 1,500 Brooklyn Dodgers games by taking bare-bones telegraph messages transmitted by Morse code and embellishing them to recreate the feeling of being at a ballpark.
snippet: Mr. Allbright broadcast 1,500 Brooklyn Dodgers games by taking bare-bones telegraph messages transmitted by Morse code and embellishing them to recreate the feeling of being at a ballpark.
